thread.title: Peter Mason
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Peter Mason

author: Peter Mason
title: Peter Mason
text: I have had the pleasure of dealing with Prestige Flowers on several occasions. Sometimes when I have planned ahead and on the odd occasion when an important date has slipped my mind generally due to the pressures of work. I can honestly say that, in my experience, they have delivered on time, every time and the items that I ordered. I have not had cause to complain so hope never to find out how well they respond to a complaint but if it is as good as the rest of their service then there should be no concerns.
